text: Mad Dogs and Englishmen may refer to: *"Mad Dogs and Englishmen" (song), 1931 song by Noël Coward *Mad Dogs & Englishmen (album), 1970 live album by Joe Cocker *Mad Dogs & Englishmen (film), 1971 Joe Cocker music film *Mad Dogs and Englishmen (film), 1995 Canadian/British film *Mad Dogs and Englishmen (novel), 2002 Doctor Who novel *"Ballad of Mad Dogs and Englishmen", single by Leon Russell from the 1971 music film and included in the album Leon Russell and the Shelter People ==See also== *Mad Gods & Englishmen, 2006 comic strip by Simon Spurrier and Boo Cook
title: Mad Dogs and Englishmen
